summary.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: This class can be used to specify a restriction on the minimum length of the data value of a element.

span.span: This class can be used to specify a restriction on the minimum length of the data value of a element.

summary.span: The length must be greater than the value of the element.

span.span: The length must be greater than the value of the element.
